item.title: Mentioned by Squamish Chief
item.description:
Eight MPs visit Squamish
Wai Young, Member of Parliament for Vancouver South, and John Weston, MP for West Vancouver-Sunshine Coast-Sea to Sky Country, board a special CN Rail passenger train for a return trip from Squamish to North Vancouver on Tuesday (June 25). Young ...

item.title: Mentioned by Wall Street Journal
item.description:
Harper Government highlights ways the Asia-Pacific Gateway is helping ...
VANCOUVER, June 24, 2013 /CNW/ - Wai Young, Member of Parliament for Vancouver South and Co-Chair of the Canada-China Legislative Association, on behalf of the Honourable Ed Fast, Minister of International Trade and Minister for the Asia-Pacific ... Over the next few days, MP Young will meet with key transportation and industry leaders on how the Asia-Pacific Gateway is building on Canada's competitive advantages, to further increase Canada's exports and investment ties throughout the Asia-Pacific ...
